oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Ralph Emery On The Record with Barbara Mandrell - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Recording from Ralph Emery's (entertainer) interview of Barbara Mandrell (performer) for Ralph Emery: On the Record With Barbara Mandrell. The tape features guest Rush Limbaugh. The recording is performed in front of a live audience. The recording is from June 23, 1995. The tape is labeled as part 1.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Ralph Emery; Barbara Mandrell
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Ralph Emery converses with the crowd off-air -- (00:33) Emery introduces Barbara Mandrell, and Mandrell praises Emery -- (02:06) Emery invites Mandrell to reflect on the car crash that resulted in multiple injuries and death -- (08:58) Emery inquires about the effect of the wreck on Jamie Dudney and Nathaniel Dudney -- (12:26) Emery asks Mandrell about the residual effects of the crash and both discuss Mandrell's microphone -- (16:05) Emery asks about the communal response to Mandrell's accident -- (21:49) Emery inquires about the psychosomatic results of the accident -- (24:51) Emery indicates how Mandrell told him, after the accident, she wished to no longer perform -- (26:17) Emery has Mandrell setup the steps Mandrell took to perform for the Country Music Association Awards Show -- (28:15) Emery plays a clips of Kenny Rogers and Mandrell conversing during the Country Music Association Awards Show -- (29:21) Mandrell and Emery discuss the effort Mandrell took in order to perform for the Country Music Association Awards Show -- (30:50) Emery plays a clips of Mandrell on the Grand Ole Opry while she was pregnant -- (32:59) Emery and Mandrell discuss the reaction to Mandrell's pregnancy, and Emery reintroduces the incident -- (37:15) Mandrell reflects on the devastating effects of the car incident on her public image -- (45:12) Emery inquires about the good that came out of the accident -- (46:58) Emery asks Mandrell to reflect on Mandrell's musical family, and Emery posts a picture of Mandrell at her marriage -- (49:49) Emery asks Mandrell about how she's doing off-air -- (51:20) Emery inquires about how Mandrell made her comeback at the Universal Amphitheater -- (55:58) Emery plays a safety commercial Mandrell performed in -- (56:22) Emery asks about the mental damage seeing the vehicle had on Mandrell -- (57:31) Emery introduces Rush Limbaugh, and Emery questions Limbaugh on when he met Mandrell -- (59:44) Emery asks Limbaugh is he knows Mandrell had read both his books; additionally, Emery asks about Limbaugh's possible conflicting beliefs -- (1:02:30) Mandrell thanks Emery and praises Limbaugh -- (1:03:40) Emery inquires about the tours Mandrell took to Vietnam during the Vietnam War
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Emery, Ralph; Mandrell, Barbara; Mandrell, Barbara, 1948-;
